hints.content:
The $\purpleD{\text{numerator}}$ is the number of equal parts being counted.

The $\blueD{\text{denominator}}$ is the number of equal parts in **one** whole. 

$\dfrac{\purpleD{\text{numerator}}}{\blueD{\text{denominator}}}$

The $\blueD{\text{denominator}}$ is $\blueD3$, so we need $\blueD3$ equal pieces in each whole.

The $\purpleD{\text{numerator}}$ is $\purpleD{8}$, so we need $\purpleD8$ equal parts shaded.

The following images show $\dfrac83$ shaded:


[[☃ image 1]]


[[☃ image 2]]

options.alt: Four rectangles. Each rectangle is divided into 3 equal parts. In the first rectangle, 3 parts are shaded. In the second rectangle, 1 part is shaded. In the third rectangle, 1 part is shaded. In the fourth rectangle, 3 parts are shaded. !
Three rectangles. Each rectangle is divided into 3 equal parts. The first rectangle has 3 parts shaded. The second rectangle has 3 parts shaded. The third rectangle has 2 parts shaded. !

question.content:
Each large rectangle represents $1$ whole.

**Which images show $\dfrac8{3}$ shaded?**

[[☃ radio 2]]

choices.content: ![Four rectangles. Each rectangle is divided into 3 equal parts. In the first rectangle, 3 parts are shaded. In the second rectangle, 1 part is shaded. In the third rectangle, 1 part is shaded. In the fourth rectangle, 3 parts are shaded.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/887df9102b830fd4ea699a826bd7465b19781019)

![Three rectangles. Each rectangle is divided into 4 equal parts. In the first rectangle, 3 parts are shaded. In the second rectangle, 2 parts are shaded. In the third rectangle, 3 parts are shaded.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e091050b05faea0a0e47d56b235e8b1d0e5c70ec)
![One rectangle. The rectangle is divided into 8 equal parts. Three parts are shaded.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/97fb3b3960c00d8781679e3fae97173b5790d537)

![Three rectangles. Each rectangle is divided into 3 equal parts. The first rectangle has 3 parts shaded. The second rectangle has 3 parts shaded. The third rectangle has 2 parts shaded.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/021b8dde7aefc5bc665e0e1e0f4d21f5fe7a5560)
